alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:18PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Grant, southwestern Caldwell, southern De Soto, Red River, Natchitoches, La Salle, northern Sabine and southern Winn Parishes through 200 PM CDT... At 116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mayna to 6 miles east of Colfax to 12 miles northeast of Many to near Zwolle. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Mansfield, Winnfield, Jena, Coushatta, Zwolle, Colfax, Olla, Campti, Montgomery, Converse, Midway, Allen, Oak Grove, Urania, Pleasant Hill, Provencal, Natchez, Martin and Clarence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Winn
